objective: Eliminate WinError 32 PermissionError in MemoryHub stats tests on Windows by ensuring resource cleanup.
implementation_guide: 1. Refactor tests/test_memoryhub/test_stats.py to use context managers for LayeredMemoryManager. 2. Ensure manager.close() is called before tempfile is removed; add gc.collect(). 3. Add pytest fixture for strict resource warnings. 4. Verify Windows and Linux CI green.
success_criteria: All tests pass without PermissionError on Windows runner; CI matrix green.
